documents.document:
Map Of Malaysia – Your Best Travel Guide

Ever thought of spending your holidays in the lap of nature? Well if no then give it a thought and plan a trip to Malaysia. One of the most sought after travel destination these days. Malaysia is located on the South China Sea in the center of Southeast Asia. Every year more and more travelers come here to make their holidays special.

To make your Malaysia trip more convenient grab a copy of Malaysia map. Explore the beauty of this country with the Malaysia travel map, your best travel guide.

Vetement Indiens (Indian Clothes)

The bright colorful traditional clothes of India ( les vetements indiens) has always fascinated the travelers coming on a trip to India ( Voyager Inde). Their designs, texture, colors, stitching everything is perfect. Although they do vary from region to region. And from religion to religion.

Taj Mahal History

In an antique land, witness the living legacy of eternal love. For centuries, the Taj Mahal has inspired poets, painters and musicians to try and capture its elusive magic in word, color and song. It is one of the most flawless architectural creations of the world. The architectural wonder is described as having been designed by giants and finished by jewelers, a lustrous pearl and a tender elegy in marble. The white marble mausoleum with stunning architecture speaks of the bygone splendor. Glorifying history of Taj Mahal is quite interesting and surprising.

Taj Mahal Tour Package

Taj Mahal, the name itself is sufficient to remind us of one of the most popular love stories of its times. The story of a King Shah Jahan who made a beautiful mausoleum in the loving memory of his beloved wife Mumtaj Mahal( who died while giving birth to their child).

Every year the charm of Taj Mahal attract millions of travelers to Agra ,from all around the world. Infact some travelers especially visit India to experience the real aura of this white marble monument. So if you are also planning to visit Taj, just look out for some really interesting travel options offered by Taj Mahal Tour Package.

Here is a list of some popular travel packages:

Golden Triangle tour:
It covers the three most famous tourist destinations of India that are Delhi-Agra-Jaipur. This tour begins at Delhi where you can visit places like Jama Masjid, Lotus Temple, India Gate and many more. Then the next morning travelers leave for Jaipur via road. Here you can indulge yourself in an exciting shopping spree while watching the magnificent forts and palaces of the city. The last destination of this tour is Agra the city of Taj Mahal.

Buddha Tour with Taj Mahal:
Awake your senses and indulge yourself in the spiritual devotion of Lord Buddha when you plan Buddha tour with Taj Mahal visit. This package covers destinations like Delhi - Agra - Jaipur - Varanasi - Bodhgaya - Vaishali - Kushinagar - Lumbini - Kapilvastu - Sravasti - Balrampur – Lucknow. All these destinations have important relevance with Lord Buddha and are visited by thousands of Buddhist followers who come here from different corners of the world.

Taj Mahal and Tiger Tour Package:
Watch the real King of jungle in its natural habitat with the Taj Mahal and Tiger Tour. Imagine watching a tiger just in front of you hunting and playing with its cubs. What a sight it would be, simply speechless. It covers main places like Delhi - Mandawa - Jaipur - Ranthambhore - Agra – Delhi.

Yoga and Medication Tour:
Everyone needs a relaxing break from their hectic life schedule. So this package help you to shred all your tiredness and give a quite relaxation to your body and mind. Delhi - Haridwar - Rishikesh - Shivpuri - Agra – Jaipur are the major cities covered in this tour.

Apart from these one can also pick other packages like:
. Forts and Palaces Tour

. Heritage India Tour Package

. Taj Mahal Tour with Beach Relaxation and Historical Experience

. Fishing Tour with Taj Mahal

. Arunachal Pradesh Tour with Taj Mahal

. Adventure India with Taj Mahal etc.

Pushkar Fair

Fatehpur Sikri Agra- The Dream City

Fatehpur Sikri, the dream city of Akbar was established with great fervor by the Mughal emperor. For 14 years the city served as the capital of Akbar, but the scarcity of water forced him and his subjects to move away from here. Since then the city is called a ghost city and has a very low population of people.

Taj Mahal History- The Love Story Of Shah Jahan And Mumtaz

Taj Mahal, the beautiful white marble mausoleum of Mumtaz Mahal, is a perfect example of the true undying love of a King for his Queen. The King Shah Jahan saw Mumtaz Mahal for the first time in the market and fell in love with at the first sight. This was the beginning of this magical love story.

International Tours – Top 5 International Travel Destinati

Some times our daily life routine take such a toll on us, that we loose ourself. And this is true for everyone in today’s world. To escape this boring daily routine, a long break is a must. And what can be a better idea then an international travel to relax your mind and body.

Map Of Malaysia- Your Best Travel Guide

Bored of daily life and looking for some relaxing holidays to refresh yourself? If yes then Malaysiawould be the best place for some really fun-filled holidays. And with the help of travel map of Malaysia, your trip to this amazing country is made very convenient. Explore the true charm of Malaysia trip with the help of Malaysia map. Its for sure that you will never forget your trip to the country. So next time you come here do grab a map of Malaysia and enjoy your holidays to the fullest.

Dubai Cuisines- The Arabic Food Menu Delight

Yummy taste, fantastic aroma and lots of different variety, this is famous Dubai food for you. Once you are in Dubai its for sure that that mouth-watering delicacies of the Arabic food menu will surely tempt your taste bud. Dubai is one city that offers the travelers a wide range of tasty menu, weather its Iranian cuisine, India food, European food, you will find it all here.

Mumtaz Mahal – The Inspiration Behind Taj Mahal

The love story of Shah Jahan and Mumtaz Mahal was just like a fairytale, where the young prince saw his princess for the first time and fell in love with her.

Taj Mahal Pictures

Taj Mahal pictures are the best way to see the various moods of this amazing monument.
